import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link, useParams, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { listOrders } from '../actions/orderActions' function OrderListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const orderList = useSelector(state => state.orderList) const {loading, error, orders} = orderList const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const {userInfo} = userLogin useEffect(() => { if(userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin){ dispatch(listOrders()) }else{ navigate('/login/') } },[dispatch, navigate, userInfo]) return (

Orders

{ loading ? () : error ? ({error}) : ( {orders.map(order => ( ))}
ID USER DATE TOTAL PAID DELIVERED
{order._id} {order.user && order.user.name} {order.createdAt.substring(0,10)} ${order.totalPrice} {order.isPaid ? ( order.paidAt.substring(0,10) ) : ( )} {order.isDelivered ? ( order.deliveredAt.substring(0,10) ) : ( )}
)}
) } export default OrderListScreen
